column4: I installed HebUbuntu(some package) and now some fonts is very small! look at the browser or at the terminal: http://img88.imageshack.us/my.php?image=adas9yf.png
and I can't open Synaptic, it's writing me some errors
E: Opening /etc/apt/sources.list - ifstream::ifstream (2 No such file or directory)
E: The list of sources could not be read.
Go to the repository dialog to correct the problem.
explain please
what to paste?
in /apt I have sources.list.backup and sources.list.save
in /apt I have sources.list.backup and sources.list.save witch od them ?
the buttons there is so small(like in the browser), where the "send" or something button?
First button is search, second is Send.
paste your sources/list file in pastebin.
Read my reply above.
/etc/apt/sources/list
Paste both of them at paste.ubuntulinux.nl
what to do with this?
At least your file looks okay. type command  'sudo cp /etc/apt.sources.list.backup /etc/apt.sources.list' on terminal (without quotes) And then tell me what you want to install.
What packages did you install?
There is no such package as HebUbuntu. Where did you get it from?
And what is it used for?
It is best not to install something from unknown sources. You never know what will break. Use repositories as far as possible.
